attributes.action: Cancel or aid current year 10s in their GCSE's next year.
attributes.additional_details: Does the government think that we will manage to gain and take in the same amount of knowledge as we would if we were in school full time. It is absurd to think this! The upcoming 2022 GCSE exams are causing an abundant amount of stress and anxiety to year 10 students! We cannot possibly learn everything in the criteria/curriculum in this amount of time at home! Something impossible is being put upon us, as there is a high level of uncertainty with this new 3rd national lockdown!
attributes.background: Cancel or aid current year 10s in their GCSE's next year. Give us permission to take notes into all GCSE's and give us a list of all topics that will be mentioned in the papers. Current year 10s have missed out 6 months of education last year and this year, we are missing more from a 3rd lockdown.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Cancel A-level and GCSE exams 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803

Review 2022 exam arrangements for GCSEs and A-levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569
